enWisdom: Relying on Allah is the strongest hope
The foundation of contentment is complete reliance on Allah

Wisdom: أَوْثَقُ سَبَبٍ أَخَذْتَ بِهِ سَبَبٌ بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The firmest rope that you can hold on to is the rope between you and Allah
hoever relies upon Allah becomes free from need
Whoever relies upon Allah has preserved his certitude

Wisdom: أَلْجِئْ نَفْسَكَ فِي الْأُمُورِ كُلِّهَا إِلَى إِلَهِكَ فَإِنَّكَ تُلْجِؤُهَا إِلَى كَهْفٍ حَرِيزٍ
enWisdom: Entrust your soul, in all your affairs, to your Lord, for indeed [by your so doing] you are turning to a secure refuge
